Flow.description: 20201222: Forked Create Sales Order for creating a flow that creates a Contract creation interface. 20200112: First version to test 20200117: Added Contract Period Type on creation. 20200125: Removed pricebook selection. It's now either all service pricebooks or all sales pricebooks. And the end date of the pb must be in the future. Removed question to halt the process at making a contract. You will have to make orders now.
Flow.label: Create Contract

fields.name: textInformationPricebook
fields.fieldText:
Choose a Pricebook

With each Contract a Pricebook is chosen. This Pricebook will be used on the Contract, Orders and Order Item. Salesforce does not allow mixing Pricebooks within a Contract.

fields.name: inputContractTerms
fields.fieldText: Contract Period (in months e.g. 12 for a year))

value.stringValue: Activate this toggle for more information

fields.name: textInfoShippingPaymentmethod
fields.fieldText:
﻿

Payment and Shipping Cost method

The default Payment and Shipping Cost Methods are set on the account. If you would like to use these default settings, do nothing.


Default Payment Method: {!getAccountDetails.PaymentMethod__c}

Default Shipping Method: {!getAccountDetails.ShippingCostMethod__c}

fields.name: textInformationPricingMethod
fields.fieldText:
Price Met﻿hod

Before we can create orders and order items, we need to know how prices are going to be calculated.

  • Group Based Rate: the price is calculated with details from the Purchase Group account (number of students)
  • Order Total Rate: the price is calculated on the totals (quantities) of the orders
  • License Usage Based Rate: the price is calculated on current product/license usage

The Bill-to Account has the following default Pricing Method: {!getAccountDetails.PricingMethod__c}
